Parameters:

fitted LDA model df_corpus: df word corpus df_id2word: df id to words mapping df_bigram: df list of bigrams

src.models.topic_modelling.train.train module

This module contains topic_modelling_train function.

src.models.topic_modelling.train.train.topic_modelling_train()[source]

Train topic models on training data.

LDA, BERTopic, and NMF models will be fitted on training data. All 3 models’ topics plot will be saved to eval folder.
